name: Boris Goes Weeing
description:
A game made in under 3 hours. Yes OK it shows lol!

Boris has had a tough year, so he decides to chill out on the Piste. Oh no, he needs to relieve him self but the only WC open is at the bottom of the mountain, on the other side of the main road!

If you enjoy this and it gives you a giggle, please consider supporting me 
ko-fi.com/rozeybozzy

Infinite Levels of increasing difficulty - can you get the Hiscore!

Post your High Scores to #borisgoesweeing  !

Controls

Cursor Keys, or Q A O P (up/down left right) Most analogue controllers should be compatible.
